name: Grown Up
description:
This was a game made for the 2019 Global Game Jam. 

Explore your house as tiny you. What will you find? Will you try to leave?

Credits:

Connor Aguilar: Programming, Design, 3D Modelling

Katie Moulton: Programming, Design

Kobi Saha: 3D Modelling, Design

Aria Dewey: Music and audio

DJ Shea: Made the TV model

Click the remote twice please

Made in UE4
